import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import orderStyle from './Order.module.css'; import CartContext from '../Context/CartContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const PlaceOrder = () => { const {totalAmount} = useContext(CartContext); const [data, setData] = useState({ firstName:"" }) return (

Delivery Information

Total Amount

SubTotal

${totalAmount}

Delivery Fee

{totalAmount===0?"$0":"$2"}

Total

${totalAmount===0?'0':totalAmount+2}

{totalAmount===0 ? : }
) } export default PlaceOrder
